Taunts the beast to draw it out and protect others by distracting it, showing courage and self-sacrifice.
Clenches fist in victory after the beast is killed.
Screams for help and survives a dangerous situation.
Engages the beast with taunts.
Uses his voice to draw the beast onto slippery stairs, resulting in its downfall and death by an oncoming train.
Remains huddled and silent under the ledge during the beast's attack, but subsequently clenches his fist in victory and efficiently uses his flashlight to locate the beast's body.
